div.p: Select Intermountain Healthcare Sensor Description code system codes.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-sensorDescription defines the following codes:

tr.td: A device that clips onto a finger in order to measure oxygen saturation.
A device that clips onto an earlobe in order to measure oxygen saturation.
A device made of cloth and adhesive that wraps around finger, toe, or heel in order to measure oxygen saturation.
A device made of foam and adhesive that wraps around a finger, toe, or heel in order to measure oxygen saturation and intended for extended use.
A device that attaches to a forehead with adhesive that measures oxygen saturation via light reflected off of the surface of the skin.
